short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a festive Christmas hat to your Twitter profile picture with a fun, interactive Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring some holiday cheer to your Twitter profile with the Christmas Hat for Twitter Chrome extension! This extension allows you to add a cute, animated Christmas hat to your profile picture. You can toggle the hat on and off with a simple button in the extension popup. Perfect for celebrating the festive season!

Features:
- Adds a fun, animated Christmas hat to your Twitter profile picture.
- Toggle the Christmas hat on and off with a button in the popup.
- The hat appears dynamically when you visit your Twitter profile page.
- Compatible with the latest version of Twitter (X.com).

Celebrate the season with style and spread the holiday spirit on Twitter!
